name: Elevator Pitch (GarbageHaus)
description:
The Story So Far...

As you stumble from the street and into an office building, it dawns on you that you have a great movie idea! But how to get it out there? Who would invest in your project?

You enter the elevator. A bald, and quite attractive, man in a suit looks at you. This is it! This is your shot! It doesn't matter that you're off your meds and have been hallucinating recently! No one can stop you!

Gameplay

Use left-click to select the "Think" button to generate thoughts. Click on the thoughts to pitch your idea to the businessman.

The Businessman's preferences will be randomly generated and he'll like one "type" of thought.

  • Good, positive thoughts
  • Bad, violent or dark thoughts
  • Neutral thoughts
  • Inappropriate thoughts

He'll also have a color preference. Wrong guesses on the right color will be less of a penalty.

Gain cash depending on the Businessman's mood which you increase by guessing right, or decrease by guessing wrong.

He also loses mood just by being in the elevator with you, perhaps you are emitting some obnoxious odor?

Endings
Depending on how well you do, there are 3 different endings
